fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose to smuggle a player. They appear as a Libertarian and are not suspicious.
- At night, choose to give a player a charge of any legal town ability from a GIM role. You can only give one charge of a role from each sub alignment except for Town Power.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You know the names of all Neutrals or Neutral Factions (ie: peasants).
